casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. MCDOUGALD
v.
GREENE 2018-0013 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 13, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. On relator's motion for agreed statement of facts and motion to refer the case to mediation pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 19.01. Motions denied. Relator's motion to accept affidavit and exhibits as attached to his writ of mandamus action to support brief and motion for relief from judgment or order Civ.R. 60(B)(1)(5) granted. Respondent's motion to strike denied.
